level.description: The level or tier of the creature.

attack.description: The attack value of the creature, used to determine damage dealt.

defense.description: The defense value of the creature, used to reduce incoming damage.

damage.description: The damage range (e.g., '5-10') that the creature can deal in a single attack.

health.description: The total health points of the creature.

speed.description: The movement speed of the creature, determining how far it can move in combat.

size.description: The size of the creature in the battle grid (e.g., 1 for small, 2 for large).

shots.description: The number of ranged shots the creature can perform. If zero, the creature is melee only.

growth.description: The weekly growth rate of the creature, indicating how many can be recruited each week.

aiValue.description: The AI value of the creature, used to assess its strength for computer-controlled players.

valueMoney.description: The monetary value of the creature in gold.

specialAbilities.description: The special abilities or traits of the creature, if any (e.g., 'Flying', 'No retaliation').

imageUrl.description: URL to an image representing the creature.

town.description: The name of the town or faction to which the creature belongs.
